recipesJson.name: Custard is for Lovers
recipesJson.author: LonesomeRhodesTN
recipesJson.description: Chocolate-covered strawberries and wild rose blended with a creamy custard.  VT Devon Cream brings a light chocolate cream kiss to the union of strawberries  . . . INW Dzika Róża (Wild Rose) subtly caresses the strawberries towards a state of blissful sweetness.  All of this enveloped in the embrace of a creamy, sultry, vanilla-tinged custard.  Good as a SNV . . . but sinfully delicious after 24 hours.
